parameters.name: EnablePage
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable paged query.

parameters.name: ErRouteMapNum
parameters.description: Policy number (default for automatic creation is 3000; The value range of the policy number manually created by the user is 1001-2000)

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ReceptionInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the received instance. Optional values:

*   **VPD**: Lingjun network segment.
*   **VCC**: Lingjun Connection.

parameters.name: RouteMapAction
parameters.description:
Policy behavior; optional values:

*   **permit**: Allow
*   **deny**: Rejected

parameters.name: TransmissionInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the published instance. Optional values:

*   **VPD**: Lingjun network segment.
*   **VCC**: Lingjun Connection.
